about_the_game: • SkullSP is a PVP survival video game, base building and base raiding, made without any economic budget, which aims to have a minimum income to be able to continue updating and improving the game, being able to improve the player's experience, the game is being developed by one person. We hope to make a profit from the video game to be able to continue updating it.

content_descriptors.notes: This content includes sensitive content such as insults, sexual comments, etc.

detailed_description:
Anuncios Beta

SkullSP, even though it is a paid version, is in full beta, but we are making it a paid version so that we can continue updating it in the future with all purchases. The beta version has no duration limit.


Futuras Actualizaciones

-More Weapons

-More Clothing Skins

-Variety of Backpacks

At the moment this is what we will be adding every x months to the game, because our budget does not reach for more. When we receive more income we will continue updating it. At the moment these are the updates that we can make.

The updates do not have an estimated update time. Think that there is only one developer in the studio, and he has his life outside of developing video games.
NOTE: The game has little to update compared to other survival games since it is focused on full PVP, so only backpack weapons and skins will be implemented.


Servidores

SkullSP has a list of servers to play on, but at the moment we are not planning to implement hosting servers for people, as it would saturate our systems, and we are not yet prepared for that.


About the Game

  • SkullSP is a PVP survival video game, base building and base raiding, made without any economic budget, which aims to have a minimum income to be able to continue updating and improving the game, being able to improve the player's experience, the game is being developed by one person. We hope to make a profit from the video game to be able to continue updating it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 10 GB MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 / AMD 500 Series or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 34 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 / RX 570 Series or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
